answers.answer: Its fine, with my last baby I always measured 3 weeks to a month bigger. Our son just turned out to be a big boy! I think the more babies we have our bellies get bigger faster!
yes dnt worry its normal im ,17 weeks wif my 3rd and look more like 22 weeks, like nike24 said i think wif each baby u get bigger quicker:-)
I was measuring like 3 weeks ahead up until about 20 weeks then it slowed down and got on track, im now measuring right on at 35 weeks.  This is my fourth.
Thanks I just worry it could be diabetes but it seems its normal n i lost 11 lb so i guess i can rule that gonna have my first ultrasound next week praying god my baby is healthy.

question: So I had a doc appt today n I got surprised because he was surprise my belly size was measuring bigger than 15 weeks pregnant it was a month more I have 2 children  n currently on my fourth pregnancy  I just wondering if its not bad.
title: its it normal
